product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
review_title: Great boxers, perfect for bigger guys.
reviews: I'm a pretty big guy. Large around the hips, even bigger out back. These fit comfortably, and aren't too snug. The material is soft, and the fit is great. When these wear out, so long as they hold up, I'll definitely be buying more.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
review_title: Pricey for just three tank tops, but they are ...
reviews: Pricey for just three tank tops, but they are long enough and stay tucked while on my motorcycle...vital as no one wants to see your crack on the road.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: Never was a fan of Fruit of the Loom, but these tee shirts changed my opinion. I am 6’6” and have a very hard time finding shirts long enough. I was always a Jockey fan, but price and poor reviews lead me to check other brands. The amazon reviews for Fruit of the Loom were really good so I ordered a 3 pack of 3x long, a size larger than usual. Should have stuck with the 2x long, but very happy with my purchase. Extremely high quality, very long, and a terrific price, (around $4.00 per shirt).. order some, you won’t regret it.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: X-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: The XL have been fine. I really like longer shirts that stay tucked ...
reviews: I'm 6'3" 215 lbs with about a 37" waist. The XL have been fine. I really like longer shirts that stay tucked in at work instead of bunching up under my dress shirt. I've ordered Jockey shirts that were way more expensive but were obviously better quality material when comparing side by side. But since it's just an under shirt, these are perfect. They do shrink up A LOT. I ordered a second pack and compared one to a shirt I had been washing/wearing and there was a difference of several inches in length, at least an inch in sleeve, and probably a couple inches in chest. So when you open the pack, keep that in mind. They start out huge but shrink down when washed.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - Boxer Brief - 3 Pack
reviews:
Wore Fruit of the Loom my whole young life. Switched to Haynes Tagless when they became a "thing" but for whatever reason, their products are shrinking waaaay too much now, figured I would try FotL again.

These boxers fit me perfectly and are very comfortable, no tags, no riding up, no issues, very little shrink. I bought the 3XL and I have a waist of 46/48. If you are on the fence about getting them, try this 3-pack, I feel you will be pleased.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: X-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: An undershirt that stays tucked in. Wahhoo!
reviews:
Update 3/2018:
Yes they shrink after dozens of washes (only really noticeable when folding them with newer ones) but they still stay long enough to stay tucked in all day and are still comfortable too. These are now on my repeat purchase list.

Update 12/2017 while these are good shirts the three pack has gone up in price significantly. The most we should pay is 4 dollars per shirt.

Wow! These are what I've been looking for in that they are looooooong and stay tucked in below my button-downs.
I'm 6'3" with 33" inseam and 38" waist and these XLT size undershirts fit just right around the chest and arms and the hem is down around lower butt cheek elevation.

UPDATE 06NOV16:
A common mode failure has been found in two of three of these undershirts: the seam on the back sleeve which joins the sleeve do the back panel has opened up after three wash cycles.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
review_title: Great for big AND tall guys!!
reviews: These shirts are nice and long, fit well and a great price. A few weeks ago i purchased another brands (starts with H) A-shirts which were 3 for $20. Those were "tall" shirts and are pretty decent, but pretty pricey. I found these shirts at 3 for $10 and I am quite pleased to report that they are just as long as the other brand and fit just as well. The only reason I docked one star is because of the unfinished bottom of the shirt, which is negligible because these shirts typically get tucked in, but it might be a problem for the longevity of the shirt. Only time will tell if that becomes a problem, but for this price and the fact that these are really long (I'm 6'8" tall) I am very satisfied!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: My husband is 6'1" and these hang down past his groin area. Way too long. They are pretty thin but that's not an issue. I washed them and they came out with a pink hue, weird as they were the only thing in the wash. So I washed them again and dumped Clorox in the machine. They aren't as pink, doable. But overall I wouldn't order these again, they are just too long. They'll be too warm for summer, so much material. They fit like a tall instead of a big.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: Great big guy's t-shirt but ripoff price
reviews: Bought 2 packs of the 3XB last year and loved them! I am over 6'1", 310lbs, and lift weights. These t-shirts fit very well around the neck, chest, and armpit areas, and was a bit extra long to boot. At only $15 a pack, it was an excellent and satisfying purchase. They've held up great, but used them for so many occasions that I made them a bit dingy - not a product fault at all. I decided to repeat the order to get some refreshed shirts, but the price per pack is now almost $40 EACH! What a total scam that kills the sale for me, because I refuse to pay over double the past price for the same product. It's a shame because FOTL has a great t-shirt here.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Big Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews:
Bought these 2XBig Fruit of the Loom t-shirts for my husband via Subscribe and Save here. He's about 6' tall, 240 lb and I like the extra width, nice comfortable look and he likes he fit. Very thin t-shirts, definitely undershirts, decent value.

My main dislike is that the collars are so wide. They look stretched out from the start, making for a very sloppy look if exposed under a sweater or something.

We've since switched to the Gildan ones available here, 100% cotton, and a bit thicker. Those aren't as widely cut and need to be washed cold to resist losing length. They're so cheap though, we'll likely replace them more often, although they're a nicer quality t-shirt overall. These are okay, recommended if you want the extra sizing. Hope this helps! Smile.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
review_title: I would like to give this product a 5 star because the ...
reviews: I would like to give this product a 5 star because the fit, quality and price are great and my husband is comfortable. The assorted colors however include RED, grey and dark blue and I would like to know who's bright idea it was to include RED. I wash underwear in hot water for sanitary reasons and red us going to turn all my other underwear pink. having had a bad experience with red fabric before, for the past 10 days I have had them soaking separately in hot water to drain out the red tint and more is still coming off the fabric. My husband has yet to wear these pairs. ATTN FRUIT OF THE LOOM: IF YOU ARE READING THIS, PLEASE MAKE THESE ALSO AVAILABLE IN PACKAGES OF WHITE ONLY, I will buy them. Thank you.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Boxer Brief - 3 Pack
reviews: So let me first state that these briefs are some of the most comfortable ones I’ve got from Fruit of the Loom. I’ve originally bought 4 packs and 2-3 weeks later got an additional 4 packs. I’ve been buying Fruit of the Looms for many of years (I’m 48). The fit great, don’t shift around and stay put throughout the day. However the quality of these briefs is terrible. Within 2-3 washes the in seams are ripping apart. I already had to through away 6 pairs (that’s a total of 2 of the packages). I have serious doubts the remaining briefs are going to last the next 3 months. I believe these may be my last Fruit of the Loom products if that’s how the quality is going to be going forward. Not worth the price I’ve paid for them.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
review_title: Burlap is cheaper and maybe softer.
reviews:
You know Big & Tall stores? Well I’m both of those and finding tanks that don’t expose my bum crack is a chore.
I bought these based on the (antiquated) notion the FoTL was good stuff. Not sure that is accurate anymore.
Amusingly the packaging had a spot that said “feel the softness” but the packaging wasn’t cut out, so all you would feel was plastic. That should have been a clue. Well they weren’t soft when I opened them (mistake one).
I tried it on and it was a little snug, but the length was good. After wondering how bad it could be and opening both packages I bought (mistake two), I washed them (mistake three). They shrank a bit and now they are even more rough feeling somehow. It’s like a tank top of white overly tight burlap that hugs you in all the wrong places. I half expect rug-burn-type rashes where these shirts hug and grind.
And since I washed them, I can’t return them. Steer clear, oh reader, find something different!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: X-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
reviews: I purchased fruit of the loom shirts instead of Hanes based on several reviews here. I like lightweight men's v-necks for sleeping and around the house. But I'm 5'7" and even the XL's shrink to be too short in the length. So I ordered these FOTL tall XL's for the extra length. As expected, they shrunk overall down to a "Large" size after 1 wash & dry. But they maintained enough length that they're good for a nightshirt. Exactly what I was looking for. They're a little heavier than Haynes but still very comfortable.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: Bigger guy looking for a lounge-around shirt? Just buy this shirt?
reviews: Totally great white tshirt for a bigger guy. I am 6'1" tall, weigh about 315lbs, and lift weights. This shirt fits perfectly around my neck and underarms, fine around the waist, and has the needed extra length to stay tucked in by itself or under an over shirt. After washing several times in hot water, they do the normal "minor tightness" when fresh out of the dryer, but then easily stretch back out with a gentle tug after putting back on. Each time, the neck stitching has maintained a nice collar around my neck, and is comfortable to wear in the house as a relaxed shirt, stay cool while outside grilling, and wear underneath other tshirts while exercising or household chores and sweating. Very good tshirt at a great price (under $20 for a pack of three).

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
review_title: You know the name you won't find a better price w/o going to a flea market and buying knockoffs
reviews: Great brand great price and if your a guy like me that hates going out to fight the crowds, try to avoid the weirdos, and then wait in long lines of the only 2 registers open at Walmart. Buy them 2 days later they are at your door and if for any reason (wrong size,found better price, or decide you don't want them anymore) all you do is hit return and they make it easy for you to send them back and your money is returned as soon as its scanned

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews:
These are the absolute WORST undershirts that I have ever owned. Unfortunately, I was unaware of the wretched quality of the product until they were washed on several occasions.

I never use bleach on my shirts as it weakens the integrity of the fabric. Before I purchased these, the last brand of undershirt that I had war was made by Gildan. Before I purchased Gildan I purchased Fruit of the Loom because that's what I had before. I can honestly say that this was a regrettable purchase because Gildan produces a better product at a lower price.

I cannot return these undershirts and I have to continue to find holes in them as I continue to use them. This is the absolute last time that I will ever purchase undershirts made by Fruit of the Loom.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
reviews: My son is a very large fellow. I got sick of seeing him in too-small undershirts (usually with holes in them). I decided to look on Amazon and found Fruit of the Loom Big Man's shirts. Wow! I bought a size 4X, and they fit beautifully. He was so thrilled with them, he asked me to send him the link on Amazon so he could order more. He is so thrilled to find a shirt that not only fits well, and looks good on him but that he says feels "so comfortable". I rarely get such rave reviews from him.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: This is my second time purchasing these t-shirts.. oh no they're not for my boyfriend or husband there for me! I love to wear t-shirts around the house that are big and baggy. These do not disappoint ! The material is very soft and they wash up beautifully. The only one thing I wish that Amazon would stop putting my packages in places to which I did not request. Like leaving my package by the mailbox when you're supposed to put the package at the customer door.. I live in a gated community but however that's not what I pay for in my prime membership.!! Oh yeah they've also thrown packages over the fence left them at the front gate on the bench we're in anybody could take things and people have.. but I digressed.. fruit of the loom has been around for a long time and they still crank out quality clothing.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
reviews: I ordered the size L Tall. I am a woman who likes sleeping in big t shirts and my old ones were wearing out. These are made a little cheaper. The hems are a little narrower than my other FTL shirts and they didn't wash it as softly as I would like. Maybe a few more washings will help. That being said, the quality is not bad. There are no flaws in the construction, loose strings or anything. They did shrink about half a size so order up for the best fit. (I washed in cold water and dried on med.)

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: These are perfect for my 6’11 hubby!
reviews: These are great! very soft and lightweight, true to size, and LONG! My husband is 6’11” and it is difficult to find things long enough for him but these are perfect for him to be able to keep tucked in throughout the day under his work shirts. Very happy that I bought two packs and will be buying more when needed in the future!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
reviews:
Fruit of the loom is known for quality products.
These knit boxers are soft,comfortable,well constructed and economical.
Being a big and tall man I suggest that you buy these boxers.
In the past I've purchased more expensive underwear that wasn't as good as these!
You may want to size down because they are roomy!
I've noticed with this product shrinking won't be a problem.
I would recommend that you buy this product it worth your hard earned money!
I hope that you find this review helpful.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
review_title: Would fit MUCH better if the tank top undershirt arm holes were larger
reviews:
Being 6'2" and 210 lbs with a 35" waist, I have an athletic/rugby build and do a lot of weight training. Before purchasing this 4XL Big Man fit size, I actually wore the 3XL A-shirt undershirt by Fruit of the Loom and as I was gaining muscle mass, arm holes were chaffing underneath my armpits. I liked the design of the 3XL having thin straps and the larger arm holes that gave a greater range of motion. The 3XL was excessively long in height, but I knew it's what came with such a big size.

When I purchased the 4XL Big Man fit size, I though it would resolve the arm hole problem, but it didn't at all! The arm holes for this 4XL Big Man fit size was actually smaller than the 3XL! The seller's picture is very misleading in displaying this.

Although these Big Man shirts give more width for the chest and rib cage, the smaller arm holes make these A-shirts more uncomfortable, and this very noticeable whenever I lie down or turn to the side while in bed. I had to resort to cutting the side seam 5-6" down from the arm holes to stop the chaffing to make these garments useful and comfortable to wear. If anybody is having underarm chaffing with their undershirts with any smaller sizes, avoiding buying this Big Man design, because the underarm chaffing will not improve with these A-shirts (aka tank top undershirts).

Maybe the "Tall Man" selection would have resolved my problem, but after monitoring the availability for 1-2 months before purchasing, a "4XL Big Tall " size never appeared.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Boxer Brief - 3 Pack
reviews: Got the 5xl for my husband who is 6’5” and weights over 300lbs. They where a bit large but once washed they shrank a bit and looks like they’ll work perfect for him. I always struggle to find some that will fit not just in the waist but in the height as I want him to feel comfortable wearing something that covers everything. This ones work perfect would be buying more for him. So make sure you order a size bigger as this material shrinks over a wash but would definitely recommend them.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: Bought this brand for many years. Tried Calvin Klein etc but prefer these. Only the last two times did I purchase the Large Tall and the length makes a big difference. They hold their shape well and overall are a great product at a reasonable price. Thickness is good and better than you might expect for the price. Highly recommend!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: These are my favorite undershirts. It's hard to find tall clothing in the stores with out them being big as well, and the subscription service is the best. one pack every 3-6 months and my wife doesn't complain about me staining them any more. I wouldn't wear them by them selves, but I'm also a big fat guy that just wanted some undershirts that didn't shrink up after washing a couple times.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: Taller than average perhaps. Not very tall.
reviews: The material is excellent. But the size is more like average-to-tall. Husband is extra tall, in terms of clothing (6’8” or 203cm), but these are barely different from regular sizing. And I’ve bought from other brands before with good fitting results. I would guess 6’4” max for these.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: Good as undershirt or just to wear around.
reviews: I'm a big guy amd these are some of the best fitting plain whits t's i've had. They are on the longer side but not annoyingly so. Love the thickness as well. I use these as undershirts for work all the time, and wear them as a regualar shirt after work running errands. They are thin enough and breathe well to use as undershirts, but i feel comfortable just wearing these by themselves as well.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
reviews: So soft against my skin, like silk, in cotton form, bouncing across my belly. It’s long enough where you can’t see side boob, but you can’t see my crotch either. When you look like a ball like I do, it’s hard to find tank tops that don’t look like sports bras, so if your belly hangs low, this is the way to go.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
review_title: Leg length a little short, otherwise really nice
reviews: These were ordered for my hard-to-fit, hard -to-please husband. He wore Jockey mid-lengths for almost 50 years; now we can’t find his size in 100% cotton. He is a heavy older man and is uncomfortable in anything tight- fitting. These have been very comfortable and non- binding but the legs are shorter than he’s used too and ride up. I don’t know if getting the tall man version might help in that regard although he definitely not tall. The price seemed reasonable and he seems to like them.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: True, Tall Cut T-Shirt. Nice Product!
reviews: If you like a snug fitting T-shirt, then purchase your normal size. If you like a looser fit, go up one size. These are actually cut for a tall person, unlike others that boast a tall fit. It's been quite awhile since I purchased this brand, so I was pleasantly surprised when I took a chance and the fit was true to size. For the price, these are a nice lightweight, tall cut shirt. Would recommend!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: These fit great, but know they will shrink
reviews: These fit great, but know they will shrink.. I buy the tall size because the fruit of the loom undershirts always seem to shrink on me big time and I can no longer tuck them in. With the tall version, that is no longer an issue. They area really long at first, than after washing they are normal length. Way better than buying the normal ones than being too short for myself. I do on ocassion have issues hiding the v-neck collar under my shirt after its been work a bit. Maybe it's the other shirt above it that's the issue, I don't really know, but felt like I should bring it up just in case.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: After one washing, these 2XT shirts are barely T at all. They shrunk a good 2-3 inches from new-out-of-the-package. And now they are all slightly different lengths, so I don't know if these are the factory seconds, counterfeit, or just cheaply made.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - Boxer Brief - 3 Pack
reviews: Yes, I’m a chick but I hate my thighs rubbing together & these are great for wearing under loose dresses. They also make excellent PJ shorts.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: X-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: Perfect undershirt for a normal tall guy
reviews:
If you are like my husband and a XL works great EXCEPT for the length, then this is the t-shirt to get! He loves them. Really durable cotton that washes clean, they hold up a long time, perfect length to tuck in and the perfect width that is slimming on him but not swimming!

Can't speak highly enough about Fruit-of-the-loom's men's undershirts. You can tell they have been doing this a long time - the quality shows.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
reviews: Bought these for my husband since the weather is already warm here in the south. They are exactly what he was looking for to wear under his work shirts. They wash and dry great! I was afraid they might shrink in length but they haven’t at all. I’m VERY impressed with these tees and you cannot beat the price! I just ordered 3 more!!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
reviews:
A man becomes accustomed to a certain style and fit when it comes to underwear. Previous purchases have been wearing out (as expected; men are rough on undergarments, so no complaint to be had there). However, no longer able to find similar products on store shelves in the past few years, my boxer game had went the way of the cliché man with ratty, worn out underwear.

Luckily I found this product and am very happy; now I will be able to replace the ones that have served their duty and are ready to become cloth rags to spray furniture polish on or something. Even splurged for the bigger packs.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: The quality seems ok but the worst part is how badly they shrink after only ONE wash, making them basically unwearable!!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: X-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
reviews: These were awesome! Took a bit to convince my honey that he needed to switch to a big and tall style (he is 6'3"). Tried explaining that the reason all his t-shirts would rip under the arm is because they were too short and he was tugging so hard on them to be able to tuck them in to his pants. I bought these and convinced him to try them. He is ecstatic! The underarms aren't ripping, they are extremely comfortable and he can not only tuck them in with ease...they stay tucked in. Will be buying more for sure.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: These aren't perfect, but darn good enough. Especially when you factor in the price. It's tough to find a true big and tall undershirt - many brand I've tried are way to short, or the sleeves are too long, or the neck holes stretches way too much, etc. But these are just a good, basic undershirt with no major problems in my opinion. This is the second time I purchased these and the only issue I've noticed is that one shirt in the first package seemed to be slightly smaller than the others. But after the second package I'm thinking this was not the norm. I will purchase these again when I need more undershirts.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
reviews: Just got them today they fit perfectly. Length is perfect with alot of room around the legs. I plan on buying more of these, they are now my go to brand. The big and tall stores charge $25 for a pack of 2 that aren't even this nice.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - White Brief - 3 Pack
review_title: Big skivvies for big handsome, chunky, fluffy men.
reviews:
I love these skivvies!

Walmart had them advertised as being in my store, however they never had them when I went for them. In the size that I needed

And I'm pretty sure they were more expensive than at Amazon.

These brick and mortar stores need to step it up a bit if they wish to stay in business.

I normally have to go see Omar the tentmaker to get my clothes.

I'm not fat, I'm just vertically challenged.
I figure that I need to be about 8' 4" rather than the 6' 4" that I am.

Clyde

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
reviews: I bought these for my husband who has trouble with lengths. He's 6'5" and roughly 345 with a pot belly and these were long enough for him to tuck in his work pants. I love them because they keep his shirts from rising and keep his butt from being exposed. We got a 4x once and they were kinda snug and short so the 5x worked wonders. He's typically a 4xlt-5xlt in tee shirts and a 44-46 in the waist, for reference.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - Boxer Brief - 3 Pack
reviews: As I opened the package a reached in my finger tips where met with a softness I had never felt before in under wear!! It was as soft as a rabbit's underbelly. When I slipt my legs through and to the ground I got giddy with excitement as the softness touched my calfs!! Oh wonders as I pulled them up and felt the support and soft comfort envelope my sack. My day spent in comfort support and softness!! I highly recommend these fantastic soft under garments to all.....

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: X-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: I ordered 3 more packs for husband.
reviews: I originally ordered just a 3 pack for my husband, he is 6'0". His regular t-shirts came untucked constantly. The t-shirts we usually bought went from super thick to thin on various packages. But these are quite nice and consistent. They are medium thickness, longer, and durable for every day use and lots of laundering. They are a tad bit long for him, but that is better than too short. I already ordered and received 3 more packages. Fully recommend for big and tall men, 6'0" or higher.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
review_title: Fits as sized..pick possibly regular size
reviews:
My husband just received his tanks today. He tried one on. He loved it. Especially the size. It's not to thick and just thin enough to wear under his work shirts. He normally do tees and cut out the sleeve. But it's 90 degrees here sometimes. So got them in the washer to see what happens. The 5x is long. He is 6ft 2in. Comes mid thigh on him. So we are going to see if they will shrink in length or in his stomach the breathe room he has now. So update later.
UPDATE..tanks did shrink the length which is what he wanted. Still breathe room in the stomach area..he is confident!!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Boxer Brief - 3 Pack
reviews: Of course the day AFTER the return window a pair of my husband's boxers ripped for no reason. They have a ton of space in the leg - which is weird bc I ordered this same pack last year and they were fitted to his thighs & didn't ride up, the bands were different and the cotton was softer. Now after this pair ripping I am wondering if they are going to hold up as long and as well. Not happy considering what 3 pair of underwear cost.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
reviews: it's a v-neck so I gotta be careful around my wife's friends as their husbands didn't eat their crusts as children and thus don't have the Tom Selleck Robin Williams chest hair like yours truly. And it's white so even the cleanest of would-be assassin kills may leave an obvious drip of blood somewhere - Customs agents eventually won't believe anyone has THAT many nose bleeds. But the cartels where you've worked deep-cover will believe it. Regardless, is a solid shirt, good value, maybe runs a little bit big but that's why one buys an xlt or xxlt or whatnot, to be Large.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
review_title: I'm 6' 7" and they fit perfect. In fact they are LONG
reviews: These are the bomb!! I'm 6' 7" and they fit perfect. In fact they are LONG.....tall guys get these they wash well and fit great. And so much cheaper than what I was paying at other sites. Gonna order more.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
reviews: I like wearing these as lounging tees or sleep tees. I purposely bought up one size (2XL) AND got the big and tall for extra length. Well, the girth is fair, but these are NOT tall, especially after washing. I have a Hanes comfort tee in XL that is every bit as long as this is—I have had it for years and it is NOT a big and tall sized tee.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Cotton Stretch Boxer Brief -6 Pack Black
reviews:
Iam sorry to say but this product for me is not good. the elastic band is too loose. fabric is comfortable yes but i loose my pants as soon i start walking. the elastic feel poor quality ,over streched and does hold anything.
i am used to wear fruit of the loom t shirt and never had an problem but their underwear,sorry but not worth the money.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: He is so happy with them
reviews: My husband is 6'5" and 225 lbs (very tall and lean). We usually have to purchase XXL, which means the shirts fit him in length, but are wide, which you don't want in an undershirt. These fit him perfectly! More of an athletic fit. He is so happy with them. They are also super soft. Great buy!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
reviews:
They have 4 cotton panels stitched together, so if you like seams, these are the boxers for you!
They're gathered at the waist, & then sewn into the waist band. This'll itch if you've got eczema.
Got the 3 pk, size 3x. 2 prs. are all cotton, one pr. was half cotton, half polyester.

***because of the vaccine deliveries, Amazon is using USPS, & they're already swamped. Expect your order
to be later than amazon estimates.***

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
reviews: Is fit me the comfortable I don't ride up that much let's be honest you're not going to find a pair of boxers that don't ride up at all but a quick leg shake and these are good I wish they had more color options I've got the same pack three times but other than that they're Great

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: I have been buying these T-shirts in 3X to sleep in or wear around the house while cleaning and gardening, for years. They last forever, wash well and there is very little shrinkage. Unfortunately, I have gained the covid 20 lbs. that seems to be going around so I thought I'd try the 4X. Since I'm practically a shut in, it has become a staple of my wardrobe. They are much longer with with plenty of room for my...let's just say sagging while expanding NEEDS to be well covered. I would definitely recommend and buy again.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
reviews: I am a female but I’ve purchased men’s white V-neck tees for years. I wear them to sleep in, either with just a pair of cotton panties or with jersey sleep pants, depending on whether I want to sleep warmer or cooler. I’ve tried several brands but these FOTL extra tall shirts are the VERY best. They hold their shape, wash and occasional bleach well. tTey don’t shrink and the price for what you get is more than reasonable! I had six and I just received six more in case I’m late getting the washing done. I want to wear only them! I’m giving all my others of non-FOTL brands to hubby. He’s not as fussy as I am!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews:
This is an update to my earlier review. I forgot to include the size undershirt that I bought.
It's listed as, LT 42-44 inches.

I'm a male, 5' 11" tall. Over the years I've had a difficult time finding white "T" shirts/undershirts that are long enough to stay tucked in. I bought some of these undershirts and I'm VERY happy with them. They are longer than most undershirts, and best of all, they stay tucked in.
From the bottom of the crew neck edge to the bottom of the shirt is 27".
Even after a couple of washings, they still fit great.
You won't be disappointed.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
review_title: For all the bigger/taller guys out there that buy these ribbed shirts from Wal Mart like I do
reviews: I read a lot of reviews saying it was too snug. For all the bigger/taller guys out there that buy these ribbed shirts from Wal Mart like I do, I bought the size as I do there (2X) and it was the exact same size minus being about 3-6 inches longer. It definitely solved my issue of the under shirt not staying tucked in all day. It now takes an act of congress to become un-tucked for me.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
reviews: I'm 6'3" with a long torso and was always complaining to my wife about how my undershirts would come untucked. It took me until I was 31 years old to realize that I needed the tall version of an undershirt. I'm an idiot for not realizing this was a thing for so long. Since my first purchase several weeks ago, I've ordered the pack of three twice more and am slowly replacing all of my old shirts. Its amazing how much more comfortable these things are when compared to having a shirt that is untucked. Do yourself a favor and try it out. At a minimum, you will get three new shirts that aren't grayed/yellowed and you should probably throw a few of the old ones out anyways.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Boxer Brief - 3 Pack
reviews: Really disappointed in Fruit of the Loom on these. I initially purchased two packs, and shortly after went back for a third. The packaging comes with black and grey colored briefs. All of the grey colored ones, within two wearings and washings, started coming apart on several seams. And different seams on each one. I've had to toss the grey ones, but I've had zero issues with the black ones. And they are very comfortable. I'm no expert in any way with regards to stitching or sewing, but it appeared there just wasn't enough overlap in the seam area for the stitches to hold. Again, I expected better from FotL. If all had performed the way the black ones did, this would be five stars.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: OVERSIZED for sure, But really Good.
reviews: The first package I ordered was 3xlg. They were good quality and looked nice. However the size was way large even though that is my normal size when I buy from JC Penny and other department stores. I reordered 2 XLg. I ordered two packages of them and got them today. Still a trifle larger than expected, but really pleased with them. I am sure they will probably shrink a little in the wash. I highly recommend this item.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
review_title: Large size is very long, but not bigger
reviews: Not satisfied. A very big size was extremely long, but not bigger around for a guy who is big in the chest/waist. Also the seams at the shoulders were very scratchy. Altogether not comfortable and not sized right.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
reviews: These T-shirts are great. First time I've bought clothing through Amazon and I am so pleased. Until now I have bought T-shirts through local department stores, same Fruit of the Loom brand, same size, but these are so much better quality, less expensive, and I didn't need to drive to the store or jostle with crowds in the aisles or at the checkout stand. The material is heavier and the length is just perfect. They did not shrink when I washed them. Before now, the length of T-shirts was inconsistent and often several T-shirts in a package were too short. And those from stores would shrink after I washed them. I could not be more pleased. I will definitely be buying my T-shirts through Amazon from now on.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: These shirts run TALL for sure!
reviews: I got these shirts for my boyfriend, and they are huge! I know that I ordered big and tall, but honestly I was impressed with the length. He didn't really care for the length, but I liked getting what I wanted! Usually stuff always runs too small, or shrinks after you wash it. So if you're looking for a men's big and TALL shirt, this is the place for you! I liked. The shirts and they were exactly what I had ordered.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - White Brief - 3 Pack
reviews: They are little bit bigger than I like, but they are comfortable. Can't mess up the color, white is white..! They feel good when you work all day in the heat.. They pack tight for travel, which is good for me.. And they are easy to wash, no color sorting.. after all, I am a guy, a ship's captain, and I have no time for sorting laundry.!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - White Brief - 3 Pack
review_title: Great underwear for the large man. Consider going up a size.
reviews: Husband loves these. I went up a size and ordered size 4. These wear well, wash well and he loves that there is no scratchy tag in the back. Highly recommend. Good quality. Better than Hanes, imo. Will continue to order the underwear as long as the price remains affordable. Have not ordered the T-shirts or boxers yet, so can't speak for those items, but the underwear is great!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: I was tired of my other undershirts that were too short. I bought these and am pleased that they fit great and are long enough for my frame. I only wear these when I'm in a shirt and tie and hated when my undershirts were not as long as my outer shirt for ease of tucking everything in. These are perfect.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
review_title: They OK I will still be trying others
reviews:
Fits loose and comfortable but I hate the button in the front that want stay buttoned and when setting my junk whole package falls out one leg or the other not wide enough in the sack area if you have a big sack.
Updated after a few washes these things are useless unless you are castrated. If you have a sperm bank bigger then a soft ball. These are not for you. They will split your moose knuckle all the way to your taint. And the one little butt on the fly well lets just say it want cage the beast.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: Seems as good as more expensive shirts

The shirt is plenty long enough for my long torso and the material is thick and soft. Time will tell if the neck holds its shape.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
review_title: I had to come back and buy more packs so I could throw away all of my old pairs.
reviews: I LOVE THESE BOXERS! Finally, I found some boxers that are made for big guys. The only problem with them is that I bought one pack, which made all of my other underwear 10x more uncomfortable. I had to come back and buy more packs so I could throw away all of my old pairs.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: X-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: Very comfortable and very well made.
reviews: I like these undershirts, the extra length saves my neighbors from unsightly "plumber's crack" as I work in my garden. The extra length stays tucked in when wearing them in social situations, even after sitting down and standing up repeatedly. I bought a dozen, so I can retire all of my former normally proportioned tee shirts. Dignity is restored!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 4X-LargeColor: Big Man - Boxer Brief - 3 Pack
review_title: They were a great buy.  They are comfortable and fit well.
reviews:
A decent pair of underwear is getting harder to find these days. I tried these boxer briefs, and I was pleasantly surprised.

One thing that I didn't like, the printed label completely dissolved on the very first washing.

I tried similar Hanes underwear, and was disappointed. I used to buy Jockey underwear (for over a decade), but I will not buy them again.

I will buy these again.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: Shirt for the long torso folk
reviews: This is the only v neck shirts I will buy, I’m only 6’2 but have a long torso causing many shirts to sit just at belt height. On any given wash that shirt could rise up to unwearable status. This shirt does not shrink enough in the wash to ever make me concerned of my mid drif at risk. Shirt gives an athletic fit and is longer than wider. If your an athletic build buy this shirt.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - Cotton Stretch Boxer Brief -6 Pack Black
reviews: Very comfortable. Perfect size in the legs, but... 2XL is too small in the rear, but perfect in the waist. 3XL is perfect in the rear, but too large in the waist. Typically big guys have buttocks, and these aren't sized for it. Otherwise these are very comfy.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: Finally, a size that fits me!
reviews: I am a big guy but although I am only 5' 11" a lot of that is in the upper torso. All the undershirts (Fruit of the loom or Hanes, whatever) that I have been able to buy are just 3XL. Between the curve of my stomach and that fact that my torso is long meant that it was hard to keep them tucked in. This 3XLT has the length I need!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: X-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: It’s tall.  It’s a t shirt.
reviews:
I usually wear an xl tall. 50 inch at the chest. 38 at the waste. Regular sizes are too short (I’m long in the body) and broad through the chest. This fits great right out of the package. And very inexpensive.
I’ll update after a few washes. Hopefully it won’t turn into an incredible shrinker.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: I AM 6'4", AND DURING THE WINTER I WEAR UNDERSHIRTS WITH LONG SLEEVE SHIRTS. I BOUGHT 2 AND 3XL AND THEY WOULD RIDE UP ON ME. BOUGHT THESE AND ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM. THEY ARE A GOOD 4-5 INCHES LONGER THAN MY PREVIOUS ONES. THEY HAVE NOT COME UNTUCKED ONCE. I KNOW PEOPLE SAY THEY WILL SHRINK WHEN WASHED BUT EVEN IF THEY SHRINK AN INCH OR MORE, I SHOULD BE GOOD. WILL JUST WASH THEM IN COLD WATER.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
review_title: Different sizing then Fruit Loom Boxer Briefs
reviews: I usually wear the fruit looms boxer briefs 2XB. Decided to get 1 pack standard boxers, ordered same 2XB and the waist is a full size bigger then boxer briefs. I still have couple pair of 3XB box briefs left as I've lost some weight and the standard 2xb boxers even feel alittle bigger then the 3XB box briefs in the waist.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: A real "tall" shirt. Comfy and good quality.
reviews: Actually tall and fits very comfortably. I have purchased a number of different items that were considered to be tall shorts but came nowhere near tall. This actually goes past my waist by an inch or two. 6'5 so im not really tell but enough to need the shirts to be tall so I don't look like I got a belly shirt on.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
reviews:
Every single pair, in less than three uses, have holes and tears in the exact same place. The back seam of the crotch and at both sides on the bottom of the fly opening. Refer to pictures.

The fly is extremely long -- over 8 inches -- and has only one poorly fitting button that pops open constantly.

Also, the size I got has an extremely narrow crotch width. Refer to second picture. The crotch is so narrow that my whole situation down there is not at all contained. I chose a size too large (my mistake, not necessarily the fitting) so maybe this isn't as bad with a proper fit. I haven't taken that into consideration for my review because of my mistake.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Big Man - Knit Boxer - 3 Pack
reviews:
I’m a plus-size female, and I tend to get hot at night, but don’t like wearing just underwear to bed because I’m weird. I also have the anxious worry that, if I have to evacuate my apartment in the night for some odd reason, I won’t have time to put pants on.

These work great as pajama shorts for bed. Light, soft, and super comfy. Great price point, too!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
reviews: These fit well. They do shrink but not significantly. They are soft. I did buy 1 size up from normal because I have experienced that undershirts tend to run small and I want to tuck mine in so it doesn’t ride up during the day. These are wider in the shoulders than most.

attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: X-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: I was hesitant to order as another brand was double the price but they are perfect. The XL Tall fits my husband perfectly as an undershirt. He’s 6’4” and about 260 lb with a bit of a belly. He has no problem tucking them in and them staying tucked. Just ordered him another pack today.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts

reviews: I couldn't find any size 5x white shirts here in town for tie dye gifts so ordered these. (Ordered on monday, received on Wednesday, dyed and gifted by friday) I love that the weight and thickness of the shirts was perfect for what I needed it for. They're softer and smoother than my usual gildan projects.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts

The stitches seem to rip at the seems and that is disappointing. Other than that these breath nicely come in a variety of sizes and colors for a great price.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts

They are thinner than my other t-shirt (Hanes) in a 4X but cost 1/2 of the cost of other Fruit-of-loom t-shirts on Amazon and Wal-mart. I have only used one so far but I would order them again.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts

reviews: I thought these were nice at first but then I noticed some of them had little holes near the crotch area and two pair had the seems on the side open, they weren't stitched up right. They have little flaws. I bought three packages. Priced well but won't be buying them again. I like the Fruit of the loom 2 pack black and gray. They are better made and durable. These are not worth the price definitely won't last to long.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts

Kept it on, wore it, then got lucky it was laundry day so I washed it that same night. It snugged down to a perfect fit. Dig the tag less line, lightweight and comfortable.

They are also long. I thought they would be regular length but these are for tall people lol. The price was good though, so I'll keep these for around the house or to sleep in.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts

Not only does my husband hate red clothes, red is a butch to wash. I was very disappointed. If you don't care a bit color, these are good. If you want specific colors, don't get these.

review_title: Plenty long enough and a moderately deep V
reviews: I'm tall but not particularly wide, and have had a lot of trouble finding undershirts that fit. I need long-body shirts, but I also want a deeper V-neck than many sold today and also want sleeves that don't peek out from under short-sleeved shirts. These undershirts aren't made of the most luxurious material, but they're quite acceptable and have a moderately deep V-neck, short enough sleeves and a long-enough body. They did shrink an inch or so after washing, which was ok, as the initial length was more than adequate.

attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
reviews:
My husband has a long torso and he's always complaining about his t-shirts coming untucked. He says these are GREAT and he loves the length. (His exact words are, "These are awesome - totally awesome!)

I washed them first, so apparently they didn't shrink (and if they did, he loves the after-washed length, so it's all good).

I gave them a 4 because like other reviewers say, they could be softer. However, I asked my husband if he cared (or noticed) and he said no. After an evening of wearing one under a dress shirt, he still thinks they are awesome.

You can't beat them for the price. All the other long white v-necked t-shirts I found were at least twice the price. And if he thinks they are awesome, well then, they are!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Crew - 3 Pack
review_title: Great shirt before washing! Shrunk in cold water...
reviews:
First let me start out by saying these shirts WERE great straight out of the package. I am 5’9” and like my shirts loose and long. Size wise I wear a 4x snugly, 5x loose, and 6x baggy. They fit big and were quite long before washing. After a single wash in cold water, and a tumble dry on low, they shrunk considerably in height and width. What was once a baggy shirt that went more than 2 inches below my waist is now a snug shirt that is ¼ an inch above my waist. The shirts now fit similar to a 4x in width, however lost about 4 inches in length. Due to the shrinkage I have taken off 2 stars for my review.

Pros:
* Price, purchased at $10 for a 3 pack.
* Nice bright white color.
* Color didn’t fade after 3 washes.
* Thin material, not too thick. Great for an undershirt and to wear in the summer.

Cons:
* Shrunk considerably after a single wash in cold water with a tumble dry on low.
* Material is a bit stiff and scratchy.

Conclusion:
I might purchase these again, if the price is the same, to use as backup undershirts. If you’re under 5’9” and a 4x shirt is baggy on you then get the 6x size and they’ll shrink to fit. If you wear a 5x or 6x normally then I’d suggest you stay away and put your money towards a shirt that doesn’t shrink and fits truer to size after washing.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews:
I'm 6 ft 4 in and I have a tough time with t-shirts. I'll buy a pack of regular length large t-shirts from the store, wash them one time, and at least one of them will turn into a belly shirt. I thought buying XL's would combat this and I was wrong; they're the same length. I could not find any Large Tall shirts at any local retail store.

I thought, "I buy lots of things on Amazon. Why not shirts?" I must be mentally challenged since I did not come up with this idea sooner.

I've washed and worn these shirts several times now and they are fine. A few of them shrunk lengthwise, but they're still long enough to wear without brandishing my belly. I can still tuck them in if they're an under shirt and bend over without the back pulling out of my pants.

review_title: Initially appeared to be too long, but after a HOT washing they are perfect! Thank you!  I ordered more.
reviews:

review_title: I will start off by saying that I am 6'4" ...
reviews: I will start off by saying that I am 6'4". Since I was 16 or so I have had issues with keeping shirts tucked in and especially undershirts. These shirts are a life saver for me. The two pros for these shirts are that they do no shrink up on me and that they do not cost me an arm and a leg. I will disclaim though that when I wash and dry, I do not dry the shirts on a high heat, but a I utilize a low heat or air dry. It takes a bit longer, but it is worth it to reduce the risk of shrinkage. I am now looking at purchasing another package of these and looking for v-necks in the next 20 minutes.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
reviews:
The "V" in the V-neck is just a notch, hardly a "V." You know why I wear "V" neck T-shirts? Because "V" stands for Victory. That's right, I'm not dressing to go to work to lose. Nope, I want to go to work and stomp the living daylights out of my adversaries. I want Victory. Victory with an upper case, shouting "V" to begin my victory lap. And I want my T-shirt to reflect that attitude.

These shirts, on the other hand, are all about a lower case Pyrrhic victory. You know the kind of "victory" I'm talking about - the kind where you have to slink home and hope the neighbors didn't see you. The kind of victory that leaves your adversaries crying with laughter and asking you to please stop. No, it's worse that that - this "v" neck t-shirt is the kind of shirt where your adversaries call you up to tell you where you've hosed up and try to help you improve your performance.

And, in keeping with the overall theme that the shirt is for luuuusers, the fabric feels like a high grit sandpaper. But it's not all bad. The overall construction of shirt is quite good. The stitching is tight and there are no loose ends on the shirts I received. The fabric looks like it will stand up to many washings.

attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: cost less than Jockey and it's clear why when you compare them
reviews:
I have always worn Jockey but they haven't seemed as nice to me as they used to be and these were on sale and I gave them a shot. I haven't had them long enough to know how they wear, but they are significantly thinner than Jockey t-shirts. That may or may not be a positive for you but they seem cheap to me. Perhaps I'm being unfair, as they are indeed less expensive.

UPDATE: I've now had these a year and I've worn them enough (or a few of them) so that if repeated washing could soften them, it would have happened by now. As I wrote above, at about $3/each they are cheap, but they're no deal. First, you can find Jockey's on sale for $6/each, which while twice as much, isn't much in absolute terms. And what I didn't notice right away is that these are called "tall" but they're not nearly as long as the Jockey version is.

The only positive thing I can think to say is that it's hard to find a tall medium and these are closer to that than the Jockey LT is. But they shrink in a way that Jockey's don't and the material difference is night and day.

review_title: Fruit of the Loom... prove it!
reviews: I seriously doubt these are truly Fruit of the Loom manufactured t-shirts... I'm positive these are counterfeits. The barely visible Fruit of the Loom stamp inside the collar which actually appears crocked, the fabric is beyond thin, the neck stretches way out with the slightest pressure... I respect Fruit of the Loom products and have used them for DECADES! And this ain't one of them... and if it really is, it is a sad day for sure.

attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews:
It was time to replace some 10 year old or so "rags" I was using that I guess you could still call undershirts if you squinted just right. Yes I hate to shop for cloths and wear them till they fall apart, Ok my bad but it is what it is. I took the plunge and purchased 1 three pack to see how they fit, WOW, very comfortable! I ordered a larger size not knowing really what size I needed since the old undershirts I had where so stretched out of shape and found they are nice and roomy but a bit too roomy.
I love that they are REALLY BIG MEN'S size, which are hard to find, but you might know that already. The shirt hangs down to my thigh which means a lot of tucking but sure feel great to have something that isn't like wearing spandex lol.
If your a big guy - grab some while you can. Price is great compared to some online "Big Men's" sites that charge $15 or more just for 1 undershirt.
Please keep these in stock!!

attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: they are a much better fit the current crop of "regular length" t-shirts
reviews:
It appears that, in order to save money, some brands have shortened the length of their T-Shirt. Now, at 5'7", I have to buy a tall. If you have really old Fruit of the Loom (my older ones are 10+ years), these are just slightly longer. However, they are a much better fit the current crop of "regular length" t-shirts. The length is about perfect but they are not very soft (800 grit sandpaper comes to mind). Also, I wish it was available in a medium, rather than starting at large.

Hanes makes a Tall that is soft AND also the right length BUT the V is not quite deep enough. Thus, if you use it as and undershirt, the Hanes shirt usually shows. I have also tried upsizing the regular shirts in various brands but always wind up with something more wide than long.

I guess I can live with the coarseness to get the right size. I'm just wondering what tall people use now.

reviews: These t-shirts are very comfortable. The "tagless" t-shirt was a great design feature and it amazes me that it took so long. These shirts fit very well if you are a bigger guy, a taller guy. In fact, I found these t-shirts to be a bit too long. Well, I'd rather have my shirts too long than too short. There's no chance that this shirt will come untucked.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: 5X-LargeColor: Big Man - White Brief - 3 Pack
reviews:
Its been a while since I was able to find "Big Men's" size Fruit of the Loom brief's and so glad I finally did. I spent over $110 last year on Jockey brand that seem to fit good but for some reason they put so much material in the crotch area that they are so uncomfortable in the warm weather.
The Fruit of the Loom seem to be more "airy" and keep me comfortable and dry (sounds bad but true). The waist band on the Fruit of the Loom don't cut into me like the Jockey do.
The only negative thing I can say about the Fruit of the Loom is the leg opening is still a bit off but still beat the Jockey hands down.
If your a big guy give these old stand by's a try again, still as good as they where 40 years ago!

attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: X-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: A much better buy than at your local Big & Tall Casual Dude store
reviews:
V-neck is low enough that you don't have to button your top button on a polo, but will show if you're a "two-buttons-down" guy. Shirt tails are long, arms are spacious but not too long (if you're a bodybuilder, look elsewhere, though). Cotton is decent, no worse nor better than the $50 for 3 no-name brand I got at a big and tall shop. Quality control is very consistent, no loose threads, no twisting.

Not as "clingy / fuzzy" feeling as Hanes, nor as soft / silky as Calvin Klein, though. Don't go for Calvin's unless you are relatively slender.

attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
reviews:
I bought a pack of these and the V-Neck to try out as an alternative to some overpriced "Hdis&ignerM" long tees that fall apart after one wash. Couldn't be happier!!!
I'm a 6ft 210lbs muscular build. Threw one on right away and loved the fit but the knit was a bit thin. Wore it for the day and then immediately threw it in the wash on HOT and then dried. Tried it on after and it shrunk to a perfect fit. The knitt tightened up as well so the shirt wasn't so thin looking anymore!!! Wash with some Oxi-Clean (not bleach) and it won't go dingy!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: Good fit. Comfortable. Stays tucked in during work or workout.
reviews:
These shirts are a good fit, even for a former football player who still goes 6'2", 275 lbs. The shoulders as wide enough to not pinch your arms when you're working out or just moving around in the office. They are extra long and have no problems staying tucked in for me.
The shirt is 100% cotton, so after an initial wash and dry (low heat with a dryer sheet) they are soft as a baby's cheek. I really like them for my workouts because they are big enough to move around in without having to worry about them exposing my "lineman's middle" to everybody in the gym.

Three comfortable shirts that fit will for less than $10? There's no reason not to get a couple packs of these.

attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Big Man - Tank - 3 Pack
review_title: Too Long & Too Snug, Unless You're Tall and Lean
reviews:
GOOD POINTS : Fair price and well-made. I purchased Size 2XB.

THE PROBLEM : The undershirts should be called "Tall & Lean Man", NOT "Big Man".

I'm 5 ft 10 in., and "filled out" like most men as they age (but not obese). The shirts are so LONG that if I was a 5 ft 10 in. female, I could use it for a DRESS. Immediately, I grabbed the scissors and cut off a Several Inch high strip across the bottom end.

Also, the "Big Man" name implied there was ample room across the stomach area. Not True. The shirt is snug around the girth. You shouldn't be able to "feel" your undershirt when you are fully dressed.

review_title: He loved and preferred the finishline/champs/footlocker tall t's BUT they all ...
reviews:
Description of the kind of shirts my husband prefers:
My husband where's a white T regularly as his go to everyday attire. He loved and preferred the finishline/champs/footlocker tall t's BUT they all no longer sell them. So we have been on a mission to find affordable tall T's. Stafford shirts are pricey but those are his current favorite.
Description of the item:
My husband is 6'4" these shirts are thin and shrink all around. Even though they shrink all around including the length he is still able to tuck them in(barely).
I would recommend hang drying them to try and save the length. Also My husband has to where a white tank top under due to the material being thin.
While he was disappointed that he can't really where these as a daily shirt he is happy he can where them under his nice button up's for church or formal events. The fact that they're thin comes in handy there.

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: 3X-LargeColor: Tall Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews: These are the first "Tall" undershirts we've found that live up to the name. My husband is 6'6", with a long torso and....not the most fit middle. We've tried Calvin Klein tall (ok at first but shrank pretty quickly, even when hung to dry), Jockey (same as the CK) and Hanes (never long enough even at the start). These came mid-thigh to my husband straight out of the package. After washing and drying, they are about 1.5" shorter than out of the package. (I'm in the habit of hanging his undershirts anyway, so I'll continue that, but I don't think shrinkage would be a problem either way.) They are decently thick and smooth, but still the nice lighter weight you want in an undershirt. The seams are straight and smooth, and I think these shirts will last a long time! We immediately bought three more packages and donated all his old shirts.

attr: Fit Type: Tall ManSize: LargeColor: Tall Man - V Neck - 3 Pack
review_title: Not that I have this amazing physique, I don't
reviews:
I recently purchased these because I got really tired of my t-shirt causing my shirts to look untidy when tucked in. Not that I have this amazing physique, I don't, but I have pride in my looks. When these arrived I was so excited, I excite easy it is one of my many flaws, because it was long enough to tuck in and it STAYED. I wash most cloths in cold water and hang so I cannot really honestly talk to shrinkage. The shirts feel GREAT after several washes and I could not be happier.
I paid the full Amazon price for these and did this unbiased and honest evaluation. I make these as honest as I can base on my experience because I know how much I depend on the reviews when I am looking at different products. If my review is helpful for you in any way, please click the [YES] button below. Good Shopping and Thanks for reading.

reviews: When I ordered these I was skeptical about the quality for the price. When I got them I was surprised by the high quality! The fit was excellent!!! I promptly ordered more. Never again will I order these from the plus size guys that charge over ten dollars for a single pair. These are great!!!! And they do not shrink when you wash them! Super value!!!

product_name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Big and Tall Tag-Free Underwear & Undershirts
attr: Fit Type: Big ManSize: XX-LargeColor: Big Man - Crew - 3 Pack
reviews:
I wanted to find some undershirts that had the length to go with the roominess of a bigger-sized shirt. I found it. These shirts have the extra length as well as extra fabric around the belly. They're absolutely comfortable and even hold up extremely well after washing.

One thing to note is that I'm regularly a 2X guy, so after going with the 2XB I found that maybe the 1XB would have done better in regards to being more form-fitting. Hence why I selected "Somewhat Large" in the box above. Of course, this is all dependent on the dimensions of the wearer and preference in fit. Nonetheless, I loved them and I will be ordering more in the near future!
