product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Black
review_title: perfect daily wear or gym shirt - classic fit shirt.
reviews: I hate that most sports brands are moving towards slim fit. I used to wear a Nike XL for working out but now the Nike XL is too tight and short (They changed the fit) I tried NIKE XXL which fits in the shoulders but is way too loose in the mid section. I'm 42 and wanted an old school classic fit that wasn't too short. I'm 5'11" 245lbs and i bought the Amazon XL and it fits perfect. Its not too long and not too short just perfect.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black
review_title: good if you live in bubble wrap world
reviews: great fit and feel.. but very very sensitive to snags. got velcro near one and it made a hole, the other got too near a wall edge and pilled and snagged. will not buy again.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
review_title: I'd give it more stars; if it wasn't damaged.
reviews:
I bought this thinking it was a good deal, and fair is fair, they ARE good. They feel good and the quality seems fine (you get what you pay for). | BUT | they do fit pretty big/long, and one of them came "damaged", I guess, is the best way to put it.

If you see the pictures, the white shirt seems to have some sort of print that you can see through. It's not a logo, at least it doesn't seem to say anything, but it's there and it's noticeable.

I thought of returning it, but then I said to myself, "why go through the trouble?" I'll just wash it and hopefully it'll come out. Well, I did, and it didn't. So now I'm stuck with it. I guess I can use it at home?

Like I said on the title, I would've given it more stars, it's not a "BAD" product, but this was my experience. Hopefully it won't be yours.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: I bought these for my husband for his workouts because he was in need of some new ones. I picked the Amazon Basics because we both have other workout clothing (shorts, shirts, leggings) by Amazon and the quality is perfect. These shirts look nice, wick away moisture and don't hold that funky 'gym' smell.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
review_title: All good except for one thing
reviews:
The shirts fits good, feel good, look good.... until you wear it once. Or in my case, once.
If you are ever near anything that might snag, kiss the shirts goodbye. Seriously. A sharp finger nail can rip these up. Wore brand new one outside, trimmed the evergreen, came in, and then noticed that the shirt looked like a porcupine just took it off. The thing can snag and puff up like nothing I have ever had. If you wear them and nothing ever touches them they are probably a 4 or 5 star, but if you do anything in them, I think you will experience what both of mine did, snag to death so don't waste $1 on these.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black
reviews: These shirts are extremely comfortable, wick sweat and the collar doesn't stretch.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: These shirts are made much cheaper than the amazon Essentials Men's Tech Stretch Short-Sleeve Performance T-Shirt that are sold individually. The two pack amazon performance shirts have little holes completely around the polyester shirt versus the individually amazon shirts are solid polyester. In my opinion, I think the solid polyester shirts are much more comfortable.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black/White
reviews: This is some weird material, not cotton but still comfy. The white one fits how I expect a xxl on me to fit, the black one is a bit smaller, mainly in the chest/stomach area. Nice collars.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black
reviews:
These are fine for a light-weight T-shirt. But I use these more in the winter as a base-layer.
I usually fall between between M & L. I got the Med and it was plenty big - too big for what I want.
The material is light-weight, and I didn't find the a particularly good value for the price.
I sent them back. I'll stick to the name-brand I'm used to, which I can still find at a better price.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Orange/Navy
review_title: Great fit but snags on everything
reviews: Comfortable and these have a very roomy fit! The colors are bright and I have no issues with any of that. The huge issues for me are since I use these out and about, one of my nails snagged a huge line across the mid section. Now I have a line with a bit of the fabric sticking out. The other thing is the seam on a sleeve and neck have unraveled. I have only had these for 6 months!! I have hanes undershirts who get destroyed out in the 100 degree weather and look nicer after YEARS of wear. It is unfortunate but take your money elsewhere as these shirts won’t last long at all.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: SmallColor: Black/White
review_title: Same material, different design, sizes are larger now
reviews:
I bought some of these Amazon brand shirts (small) a bit back (2 years or more) and loved that they actually fit me (male, 5'6", ~130lbs). But now it seems they are being made by another provider or Amazon has changed the sizing because the small is much longer than it used to be and it's also a bit more baggy even after washing/drying on high heat.

If you're a bit bigger than me, I'm sure the shirts will fit fine but if you're body type is anything like mine, (string bean) you might feel like you're swimming a bit and they won't match your other Amazon shirts.

Quality and material are the same as well as keeping it away from animals with claws (these types of shirts are absolutely destroyed by claws due to their sweat wicking fabric), just wish Amazon would have let customers know that they changed the design or provider.

I may be finding another brand of shirt to use for long distance biking.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Green/Black
reviews:
I bought these for my husband to try out as undershirts. He likes to wear wicking shirts under his button shirts for work and they can get pricey. I don't really mind, as he wears them outside of work, as well and wears them out, but I saw these and figured we'd give them a try.

He said they fit as well as most of his other wicking shirts and don't chafe (he's "sensitive"). I kinda doubt they will fair as well as some of the other shirts have, I've already seem some pulling, etc. But, for an undershirt they've been working well.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Dark Grey/Black
review_title: A great shirt ruined by a new Amazon supplier
reviews:
I bought these a year ago and loved them. They were a great deal for a performance t - soft, stretchy, and comfortable with great moisture wicking at a low price So recently I bought 8 more for a trip.

The quality has taken a real nosedive. The shirts have a strong off gassing smell even after laundering, and the material is notably stiffer and itchier. Both versions are 100% woven polyester, but the new one *feels* like cheap polyester - sticks to my skin when I move and looks shiny. At least it's still somewhat breathable and the colors are nice, the only reason this didn't get a 1-star.

I checked the label and the old shirts were made in Mexico while the new ones are made in El Salvador. I'm guessing Amazon changed their supplier to someone cheaper and this is the low-quality result. I definitely won't buy these again.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Dark Grey/Black
reviews: I have gotten Amazon Essentials clothes before but this time it was really very disappointing. I usually check the reviews and comments before purchasing anything whether it's online or at a store. This type of "performance" shirt can be found at other stores (like *otLess or *ack's here in NYC) a little cheaper and with a similar quality. Alas, I decided to give Amazon Essentials a try since I'd gotten other clothing items before which have been okay. Well, after I washed it the first time (following the instructions), you can see in the pictures how there's already some damage due to the poor quality. I would like to say, "you get what you pay for" here but, in this case, it is not like they were super cheap, unfortunately. I am hoping that the other shirt holds up better as I am not looking forward to writing, yet, another review.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Black
reviews: I wasted so much money on Nikes, Adidas, UA, because they are the top brands in the field of sport. However, as I am chubby and see that for next year, I will be for sure 15kg less than I am now, I decided to get some cheap dry fit shirts, because then I can wear my nikes, etc that I already have. However, these Amazon Essentials are just as good! I will for sure buy more if I need new dry fit shirts for working out.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black
review_title: A Great Undershirt for Active Jobs
reviews: These have become my husband's go-to undershirts for work. They are thin and fitted enough to fit comfortably under his golf-style polo shirts that are his uniform, without being flimsy or tight. They are also long enough for him to keep plenty tucked in, and he is 6' 1" and not particularly slim. He switched to these from typical black cotton undershirts and, after wearing one for an eight-hour shift, announced that he is never going back. The sweat-wicking material keeps him much more comfortable throughout the day than soggy cotton!

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Dark Grey/Black
reviews: I bought these with the intention to wear them as a casual shirt if I like the way they look, or as shirts to hike or do yard work in if not, well they're the latter. They're a kind of tight knitted look, which kinda looks cheap to me and they snag easily, 2 of the shirts I got came with multiple snags, which look really bad. There's better looking non snagging options at this price point.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: One of the shirts frayed and snagged in several places the very first time I wore it. Apparently, even the most minor abrasive will hook the material and snag the fabric. I had been sitting at a wood picnic table in good condition but found several snags across the belly area of the shirt. Also leaned up against the bricks in the lobby of a restaurant...more snags on the sleeve.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black/White
reviews:
Here's an honest review....

The product was smaller than I expected but it fit me still. I typically like my shirts baggy and very loose for workouts. These are comfortable but does not wick as well as other brands. After about 10 washes (no dryer), I started to notice they are shrinking a bit. I've lost almost 10 lbs since trying these so I know it's not me!

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: Needed some workout shirts and was tired of paying for the name brand shirts. These are just as functional as those shirts and more. They fit well, quality thickness and wicking, and wash easily.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/Dark Grey
review_title: Great cheap product that does the job
reviews: These are the only workout shirts I buy. They literally do what they are supposed to do. The only downside is they are sometimes a bit larger than needed. But I definitely continue to buy them!

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Teal Blue/Navy
reviews: These were excellent to use at the beach where they easily kept me cool all day long. They are also so soft and comfortable for wearing for work around the house. They fit and look good so I have worn them out to grocery shop and more as well. I will be buying more colors of these as they are amazing at any price, but so much better with the small price per shirt!

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black
reviews:
If you need undershirts this would be the one. Perfect for wearing underneath scrubs while at work or under a sweater.

I bought a size up to make sure it always stays tucked in.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Black
reviews: These shirts are great for wearing around the house, out and about, or really anything. Unlike cotton, the shirts keep well around the neck after wearing a while. I usually wear under a muscle shirt to go out, and they are great. I wish Amazon had these two-packs available in more color options - so many color selections are currently out of stock.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Teal Blue/Navy
review_title: Too flimsy, too delicate, not as nice as the previous version
reviews: My weightlifting teenager outgrew his old shirts from this style, so I used the "buy this again" option from my order history to get some larger ones...without checking the fiber content first to see if it was the same. Won't make that mistake again. He hates these new shirts -- scratchy, easily snagged on anything with a rough surface, and just not the same.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Burgundy/Navy
review_title: Shirt Tears Easier Than Any Other Shirt I Own Of Same Materal.
reviews: I have had other workout shirts made of same materal that I have washed for years and have zero tears as a result. This one had at least 5 tears on first wash with fabric threading coming apart. Worst shirt by far.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: I tried workout shirts from Under Armour, Neleus, DEVOPS, etc. and was unhappy with the fit and comfort of those other brands. I bought a two-pack of these shirt, and was so impressed, I bought two more two-packs. The material is comfortable and breathes well in the Texas heat. A tremendous value for the price.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
reviews: Pleasantly surprised at the quality of material, putting it on-par with higher-end offerings for workout shirts. But the sizing is, in a word, WEIRD. It’s oddly long and too big in spots while bizarrely well-fitting in others. And what really trips me up is that between the two shirts they fit differently. What forms are they using to create these? Or did I just get a one-off lemon? I’ll still use — if I have nothing else available at the time.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: SmallColor: Dark Grey/Black
reviews: Literally these shirts snag big time! My son wanted some inexpensive shirts for basketball workouts. I had read the reviews and knew of possible snagging, but I didn’t think it’d snag right away. These shirts will snag on a fingernail, a ring, a corner, anything!!!!! Never would I buy them again.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black
review_title: Decent Material but lacking some craftsmanship
reviews: Initial impressions were good. The material was sweat wicking and the price is right. After a few washes, the treads in a few places were already coming out. These may last a year or two depending on how often you workout and wash them. Ideally you wouldn't want to wear a sweaty shirt more than a couple of times.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black
reviews:
Somewhat baggy for a "performance" tee, but inexpensive. They're also a little longer than usual for "L" on my 5'11" average-to-athletic frame.

These don't feel or fit like most technical tees do, and the material feels a little cheap. But they are a whole lot cheaper in price too. Depending on your build, they may be a better choice than brands like UA, especially if you need a little extra room, or if you're 6'1" or taller

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Burgundy/Navy
review_title: Large, only ture to fit if you like tight fitting shirts.
reviews: Nice material. I love dri fit T-Shirts, but I don't like wearing really tight fitting shirts. I have very broad shoulders. Depending on brands, I wear a large or X-Large. I ordered the large and it was very tight around the chest and shoulders. My son who wears medium loved them.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Dark Grey/Black
review_title: Material pulls and runs easy. Not strongly made.
reviews: We were disappointed. I bought these fir my husband fir vacation and when we unpacked them there were a few small runners/pulls in the shirts and after wearing them once and hand washing/ and drying them so many more popped up. The colors were so bright and fit so well but no matter what you did tge material just kept pulling.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Green/Black
review_title: Good fit and comfortable but snags way too easily
reviews: My husband thought this was a great shirt (fit and comfort) but by the end of the first day he wore it there were multiple snags in the shirt to the point that he couldn’t wear it out of the house. He wasn’t even doing any physical labor to cause them. Very disappointed!

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: Have been buying these comfortable shirts for my husband for awhile. The last set we got must have had an error when packaged and one of the shirts was a size or two smaller than the other which fit perfectly and like all the others we have gotten. Problem is I can’t return them because I have already washed them. We have bought them enough times I didn’t expect him to need to try them on first. Disappointed.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black
reviews: First, they run just a touch large. There was a lot of extra room in my extra large. The moisture wicking is limited to the evap capacity of your surroundings. As with ALL moisture wicking shirts, once soaked they are a sticky mess. I like them and will order more.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: If I could change one thing, it would be to be able to get two of the same color. But that’s a pretty small quibble. They are true to size and they hold up well to wearing and washing. I use them as an undershirt for my umpire plate gear and they are holding up nicely!

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: For some reason, tech shirts always fit tighter than normal. Not these, they fit the same as a xl t-shirt. That's fine. Ny only complaint is with their wicking ability. About 4 miles into my run, I can feel the weight of my sweat on my back. I'm keeping these, but will try some more expensive ones as well

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: SmallColor: Black/Dark Grey
reviews: It was fit as expected, I ordered extra small. So, it's my suggestions that you may order one size less than actual in case of such shirs because they have the ability to fit. Very comfortable they are and I think the quality is very good in comparison to price

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Burgundy/Navy
reviews: I liked wearing these, but one day the fabric frayed and ruined the shirt. I use these at work. So a little harder on the shirts then maybe most people would be. Over all great shirt to stay cool but not good for any hard work or by something that may pull the fabrics

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black
reviews:
by the photos you cant tell the facric quality, by the prive and the reviews i guesst it was good one.
didnt expect to get the chipest one... a shirt that i can buy for 5 dollars here in israel at decathlon.
i was expected more then amazon essentials.
i will send it back and ask for a refund.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Burgundy/Navy
reviews: I love these t-shirts and have a ton of them. The feel is just excellent and they don't wrinkle. How will they hold up? I can't say since I haven't had them long. I may never know because I have so many they won't go through a hundred wash cycles.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: SmallColor: Royal Blue/Navy
review_title: Very cheaply made, Frey and fall apart.
reviews: These shirts are extremely comfortable however are the most cheaply made shirts I have ever bought. They Frey and almost fall apart. I'll never but them again.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black
reviews:
The shirt fits OK in neck, sleeves, & chest, as I would expect for a size L. However, there is no "Tall" (L/T) option, so these are too short and keep coming untucked, particularly when bending.
I'm 6'2".
Crack kills, don't 'ya know?

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Black/White
review_title: Two different colors received vs white only
reviews:
I ordered two white shirts and received one black and one white.
I went back and looked and there are no two color options in what I selected.
The jury is out as far as quality and durability is concerned as they just arrived yesterday.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black
reviews: LOVE these shirts! If you've been trying to find those shirts that breathe and feel like nothing at all - these are those shirts! These are amazing, comfortable, and they don't wrinkle, either - which is a plus. I love mine and have switched out all my t-shirts to these. The ONLY item of note.... If you are a cat (or other pet) owner, be aware that if a claw or sharp object digs into your shirt.... it will remove the corresponding threads and create a straight line "tear" because these shirts are so thin. But, other than that... these are my new favorite shirts. :)

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black
reviews: Im 5,10 155lbs and I ordered Large. It fits me perfect. I was so relieved because ordering clothes online is kind of a gamble for getting the right fit. If you are my size and want to go for a slim fit you may be able to get away with medium. But for me large fits just right. My only wish is that there were more colors to choose from. Will definitely buy more of these.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black/Dark Grey
reviews: I usually buy Nike Dri-fit to workout in. Figured I’d try these because of the significantly lower price. The material is a bit different, however these are equally as comfortable and dry just as quick. I’ll be buying a few more.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Black/White
review_title: Best T shirt around at best price
reviews: I prefer these shirts to cotton T shirts because they look a lot better and are more comfortable. If you are sweating, they instantly dry and don’t show the sweat. They also won’t wrinkle or stretch out. I wear them working out, running, playing golf, or just knocking around. I never wear cotton T shirts anymore

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black
review_title: Another home run by AMZN Essentials
reviews: I just had submitted a glowing review about their black athletic shorts last week. So I ordered the Amazon essentials black dry fit T-shirts, and they are an absolute home run also! Absolutely identical in every way to the big name brands (swoosh, armor) that I used to pay $55 apiece for a except this time I get two for 20 bucks. It’s a no-brainer for me from now on. They’ve proved that their quality, fit and finish are 100% as good as those that are 4x the price.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Olive/Black, Geo Camo
reviews: These are my go-to shirts for around the house in the Summertime. VERY comfortable, and cool. They fit a bit large but I'm okay with that. Who wants tight shirts in the Summer? These are great. I've bought many of them.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black
review_title: Neck a little bit tight but ok shirt overall
reviews: Used a lot of dry-fit shirts over the years from all the big vendors. The fabric is perfectly fine. The neck is a little bit tight. I am now shopping for more shirts and while I will not be returning these, I will buy the next one from another vendor.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Navy/Red
reviews: I love a comfortable shirt, especially now that we are in our houses for ever from COVID. These are so lightweight that it almost feels as though I’m not wearing a shirt at all. I’m also a dad and I can vouch that these are spit up friendly too. Easy to wipe off and quick to dry. Does my wife make dad comments about me wearing plain shirts? Yes. But isn’t that what we all want anyway?

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Navy/Red
reviews: This shirt does everything you expect. An additional bonus is the length. I am 6’2” with a long torso and am forced to wear baggy shirts to get the right length. This shirt has the right length in the right size for me!

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black/White
review_title: Shapeless and runs a bit large
reviews:
I know I couldn’t expect much considering the price, but the fit is straight up UGLY on a lean build. The shirt runs large and there’s no shape to it, so it looks like a bad hand me down from my fat uncle. The neck is also thick and reminds me more of a swim shirt.

Maybe size down and you’ll be okay? Or don’t buy this at all, your call. Unfortunately I missed the return window by 1 day due to traveling, or I would not be keeping these.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
reviews: These shirts fit me very well. I typically wear a size medium in athletic tops but sometimes a medium can be too small or too large depending on the brand but these fit very well. The tee shirts are 100% polyester and feel great so should be perfect for my trips to the gym.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Navy/Red
reviews: Fit well, looked good when new. Threads started unraveling early on. I’d had other shirts of this type that didn’t unravel. You get what you pay for.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
review_title: Don’t buy it, what a mistake
reviews: Horrible has tags about an inch thick when you cut them out a giant hole in the shirt I hate amazon

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: I've bought a few pairs of these. My only critique is from my last order. I got the blue and red. The red in the picture is way lighter than what I got. I don't really mind but I think someone should update the picture.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
review_title: Excellent value for a workout shirt
reviews: These shirts are lightweight and dry quickly after a workout. They do not wick moisture as well as a couple other shirts I have but those shirts were about 4x as costly. Of course, there is not any logos - but is it worth it to pay 4 or 5 times as much to advertise for a billion dollar companies - not in my opinion.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Royal Blue/Navy
review_title: A bit loose and perfect for the unsculpted
reviews: These are perfect summer shirts. They fit loosely and comfortably and breath very well. The black color can even be passed as an undershirt for those who sweat a lot. A very versatile shirt and should be sold in larger multi packs.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Burgundy/Navy
reviews:
Whether it is for working out, working in the yard, sleeping, going out, whatever, these shirts are very comfortable. For the price they can't be beat.

FYI I bought a size up for a bit more room.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Black
review_title: Ok basic gym shirt. Older version was better
reviews: I've been using the older version for a couple of years now and loved them. When it came time to order new ones, I didn't hesitate. Unfortunately, they changed these shirts from the original. The new ones are made from a new shiny material and too large.. Other then that, it's what you pay for, basic.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Teal Blue/Navy
reviews: Fits loose - which I like. The collar is a little higher than I prefer (I liked the old Peak Velocity shirt collars better but these are out of stock). The fabric is very soft and comfortable and light enough for a good workout shirt.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: Love these t-shirts! The fabric is mostiure wicking but yet cool and comfortable to wear. They feel so much better than regular t-shirts. Haven't washed on yet but I will return and add to this review.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: SmallColor: Black/White
reviews: Horrible cheap quality and material. White shirt looks discolored and has a gray box imprint on it. Highly disappointed and does not look like the photos at all. Will not buy amazon clothes anymore.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black/White
review_title: White shirt had a print on it like something was sitting on top of it for a long time.
reviews: My white shirt had a paisley print on it and I am confused because my previous order was perfect. I will wash and see if it comes out if not I will return. These shirts fit loose not tight to your body.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: I bought some shirts like these in Florida and was so happy to find them online. He has several because they are soft and light weight. He suffers from post operative neuropathy and these are comfortable.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Teal Blue/Navy
reviews: These shirts fit OK but be careful as they snag. They are not very good a moisture wicking either. I will not buy again and will definitely stay away from Amazon essentials for clothing.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Black
reviews: This is a budget option, the shirts are fine as long as you're careful. Was wearing one while doing some house projects and the shirt snagged very easily on a piece of wood. The shirt is still wearable but has runs in it, like pantyhose.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black
reviews: These shirts are great. The material is soft and very comfortable. The shirts are on the thinner side but not to the point where you can see through the shirt. They are a little longer than expected but i dont mind it. Im 5 foot 7 and 170 pounds and the shirts comes down to right below my pockets for reference. I will definitely buy more colors.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Dark Grey/Black
reviews: Great workout/lounge shirts. Fit is slightly larger than mainstream brands (Nike, UA etc).

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Burgundy/Navy
reviews: These shirts are made of a material that is perhaps performance material but is not as comfy as some other. Not nearly as bad as the old double-knit but reminds me a little bit of that material

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews:
I've wasted so much money on shirts that said they were "wicking" or dry-fit that turned out to be junk. I live in AZ and these are the most comfortable shirts I have found. They do not hold sweat at all, unlike cotton shirts, and help keep me cook in the summer.

Just ordered more.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black/Dark Grey
reviews: I was opening a box at work. As I was folding down the box, a corner slightly brushed my shirt and snagged it. Ruined. It's funny because some of the reviews say it snags easily.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
review_title: Nice shirts but need lower neckline.
reviews: according to my husband, these are quite comfortable and keep him dry at the gym. He says he wishes the neckline was a little lower and one of the shirts snagged quite easily.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Black
reviews: Great value for working out

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Teal Blue/Navy
reviews: Great gym shirt. Not quite sure why I scored it 4/5 but it just seemed like I have some other gym shirts that are a little better. That said these are good and very cheap!

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: SmallColor: Royal Blue/Navy
review_title: Great value, runs a bit large
reviews: Runs a bit large compared to my other fitness shirts, especially when it comes to length. However, can’t beat the price. Material seems to be good. Too early to talk durability.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black/White
reviews:
Way to warm for workouts. Polyester fabric is somewhat heavy and not something I would choose for warm weather. Okay for layering if chilly. Fit is comfortably l
Generous.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Navy/Red
reviews: I've only had these shirts a short time, but love how they fit and feel. I'm not one who needs brand names on my workout clothes - just something comfortable and moisture wicking. These definitely do that!

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Black/Dark Grey
review_title: Moisture wicking good value T Shirt.
reviews: The Amazon Essentials moisture wicking T Shirt is well made and fits as ordered. The color ordered was also accurate. The shirt was a good value purchase.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
reviews: I bought these for working out after moving and accidentally packing all my other shirts into storage. They've held up great and safe very comfortable.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black
reviews: Great fitting, comfortable, lightweight, and moisture wicking. Sadly the shirt snags easily, affecting its appearance, and reducing life expectancy.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black/White
review_title: All good, Can shrink at high heat
reviews: Recommended for workout bike riding ect. Not recommend at high heat in dryer as can shrink. Size is fine not too loose...not too tight. Would purchase again.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Teal Blue/Navy
reviews: I like the shirt, but could be a little bigger around the center for us older guys! Or, I need to loose some “middle” weight! I do like the shirts but may get an X Large

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Dark Grey/Black
reviews:
They are really comfortable to wear.
Both tshirts fitted nicely. No too tight or too big.
I will definitely will be ordering more.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Black
reviews: They are just as good as name brand! This is worth the money. They are so comfortable and easy that I purchased more! I HIGHLY recommend these shirts!

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
review_title: Had an issue with stitching at first but Amazon fixed the issue.
reviews: Will update after a couple uses but Amazon took care of me. Great moisture wicking material hopefully stitching holds up and it will be a give star purchase.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy
review_title: I have 3 long pulls of thread in the front of the T-shirt.
reviews: The shirt fits nice and the price is very reasonable. However, after wearing it to work out on a machine (not touching it with any thing that would cause damage). And when I finished i noticed there were 3 long thread pulls in the front of the shirt. I’m not going to try and return them. Too inexpensive to fool with. Don’t buy.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/Dark Grey
reviews: Very comfortable. The body feels more air with these. These might be absorbing sweat a bit much. Might have to wash these often.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
reviews: Fits fine and they're comfortable but after 2 - 3 washes they're shot. They start having micro-tears all throughout the shirts.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Royal Blue/Navy

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
reviews: Definitely no reason to waste money on name brand active shirts like these. These are definitely the same quality as shirts that cost twice as much. I'm 6' 190lbs and the mediums fit perfect.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black/Dark Grey
reviews: I asked my husband to try out these Amazon Essentials Performance Pintec T-Shirts. Now he’s completely hooked on them. My husband owns a lot of t-shirts, but mostly tends to wear these to exercise and as underlayers. He likes the moisture-wicking fabric which keeps him cool and dry. The size large fits him as it should, and the athletic fit cut looks flattering. The shirts have a generous length which suits his physique. The shirts are also tagless so there’s no scrathiness behind the neck. This 2-pack set comes in black and dark grey, both of which make the shirts look sleek and modern. The shirts also have a subtle reflective logo at the back. My husband wants to replace all his t-shirts with these now because they are so useful to him, both as workout shirts and as cool, comfortable undershirts. I’m showing this pack in the size Medium, which I also ordered for my son.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
reviews:
What I like best about these shirts is the lightness, breatheability, and softness of these shirts.

If you like to exercise, or work outside, these may keep you cooler.

The white seemed to be a little grayer through the chest area - like a distortion of the fabric, or someone stepped on it with a dirty shoe.

These shirts looked a tad bigger than a medium to me, but my nephew says the size is accurate as a medium. I got these for my nephew who works in landscaping outside. He likes them.

If you sleep in a t-shirt, as my son does, you might like these especially.

There are no annoying collar tags to irritate your skin.

These are 100% polyester, and are washable. Personally, I prefer a mix of cotton and polyester. If you like 100% polyester, you may like these.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
review_title: Joy's Thoughts :  Classic design that breathes well
reviews:
The media could not be loaded.
 These are classic enough to either wear to the gym/workouts or just for everyday use
The material is 100 % polyester
Breathes well the moisture-wicking makes a big difference when it comes to feeling dry and comfortable. Especially if you are a bit prone to sweating - let's be honest no one likes embarrassing wet spots
The shirts have a small double stitched hem and collar that in my opinion give them a bit of versatility. Stylish enough for everyday wear yet still functional for the gym or outdoor activity.
After a couple of washings, the stitching and material showed no signs of breaking down
The material is lightweight and being polyester there is a bit of give to the fabric allowing for ease of movement whether it be working out or just everyday wear.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
reviews:
Great value for solid basics

At current pricing of nine bucks a shirt, these simple dri-fit style tees are versatile and feather light. I have tried several brands over the years and have learned that Nike quality can be all over the map depending partially on price point, but also on which particular factory across the bond did the manufacturing. This practical set from AE is on par with brands such as Champion you will find at sporting goods and better quality discount stores like the one with the big red circle. Highly recommended, especially at this price, and also great for layering.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
reviews: Amazon Basics tend to be very reliable. Their clothes and other products come in simple packaging and are made of quality materials. This is no exception. One aspect I like about these shirts is that they are different colors, so it doesn't feel weird to wear one one day and another the next. They fit well, just slightly on the larger side, but I'd describe them more as relaxed fit than being too big. They wash well and have held up through repeated use.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black
review_title: Cheap quality, smells terrible, very thin
reviews: These shirts came out of the bag reeking of something between body odor and burnt plastic. At first I thought the were used and returned, but I think it’s a byproduct of the manufacturing process. They absolutely stink terribly and highly recommend washing the hem immediately after delivery. They are also very thin and cheap feeling compared to other brands.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black/Dark Grey
reviews: These are great shirts for the cost! The colors are nice and they fit perfectly. True to size. Typically order a large and that's what I got in these. 6'2'' and 180 pounds. The price is right too. I've worn and washed them multiple times- still look good and the color hasn't faded at all. I don't do anything special, just throw them in with everything else. If you're looking for a cheap shirt that's a nice quality with performance material, give these a try!

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black/Dark Grey
reviews: Amazon products have consistently exceeded my expectations, this shirt 2 pack is no exception. Breathable, moisture wicking fabric, sports tees, on black and one great. They run a little large, so if you order medium to large and expect a wash & dry to take the size do wn for you, this won’t happen with this space-age fabric. Sturdy, quality made, I highly recommend this for your next workout gear choice.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
review_title: Soft material. Runs a little big. Nipple-gate alert.
reviews:
These are nice basic shirts. Got the 2 pack with one white and one black shirt. Both run a little bigger than expected but still fits alright.

These shirts are made of a soft fabric that may be an issue for someone who's conscious of their nipples standing out. This is my biggest issue with these shirts. But I can still wear them under an open shirt or as undershirts.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: LargeColor: Black
reviews:
I bought the two pack of black shirts in XXL. They fit pretty well and initially though they were just might be a little big until I washed them.

I then bought the B&W two pack in XL. These were a bit too small and I now realize the XXL are much better fitting for me. I would however like to see the white shirts offered in a two pack or see these shirts sold individually. Overall great shirt! I primarily wear them as under shirts under a polo.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/Dark Grey
reviews: I got these two shirts as I have been going to the gym to workout. It is very good quality shirt that fits true to it's sizing. The material is really nice and helps keep me cool as my body temperature and heart beat rises. I've been using this shirt when doing weight lifting, to cardio, and even indoor rock climbing. I wash it with similar colored clothing on a regular wash cycle and regular drying cycle. There's no lingering smell or sweat discoloration.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/Dark Grey
reviews: Nice shirts. Fits pretty much as expected on me at ~73.5", 185lbs. Shirts are the smooth fabric that looks wet when sweating, but dries very quickly. They are comfortable, but also look good. The colors are the basic type that I like anyway, so this is a great 2-pack.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
reviews:
These are decent quality workout tees at a very reasonable price. At the time of this review the retail price was $18 for a pair of tees. They wick moisture nicely and machine wash and tumble dry and come out looking great. They are 100% polyester but they don't stick to things or hold static like some polyester clothing. The quality feels very nice.

My husband normally wears a medium and this medium fit him perfectly.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: X-LargeColor: Black/Dark Grey
reviews: As sports shirts, these generally live up to expectations. They dry quickly and are thin, but not translucent. They are lightweight and fit as expected. They look trim and are well-made with no flaws. The main point that I didn't care for was the feel of the material. I have similar shirts which a much silkier feel and a finer weave that perform similarly when exercising. These just feel coarser and rougher and aren't as good feeling on the skin as I would like.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: MediumColor: Black/White
reviews: These Amazon Essential Men's 2-pack performance T-Shirts are true to size, well-made with a good quality fabric, comfortable and flexible. The only thing I don't like much is that the fabric is so thin that details of one's body can be seen. But for working out that's not a big issue, and I like to wear these T-shirt at home too. They are very easy to wash and dry, and overall, a good choice.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: null
reviews: This shirt is great, comfortable and has been lovely in the florida summers. The only issue I've had is that it snags on everything and you get little tears or pulls on it. I've bought 4 of them, but won't buy any more because of that unfortunately.

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black

product_name: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech T-Shirt, Pack of 2
attr: null
review_title: Neckline Too Small For Large Size Ordered
reviews: I ordered the Large size in black. The length was fine but the neckline on both shirts was so small I could not get it over my head. I even tried stretching the necklines overnight with a hanger but to no avail. Returned item for refund.
